description: Use the browser.contextualIdentities API to query and modify contextual identity, also called as containers.

types.description: Represents information about a contextual identity.

name.description: The name of the contextual identity.

icon.description: The icon name of the contextual identity.

iconUrl.description: The icon url of the contextual identity.

color.description: The color name of the contextual identity.

colorCode.description: The color hash of the contextual identity.

cookieStoreId.description: The cookie store ID of the contextual identity.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Retrieves information about a single contextual identity.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Information to filter the contextual identities being retrieved.

name.description: Filters the contextual identity by name.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Creates a contextual identity with the given data.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Details about the contextual identity being created.

name.description: The name of the contextual identity.

color.description: The color of the contextual identity.

icon.description: The icon of the contextual identity.

functions.name: update
functions.description: Updates a contextual identity with the given data.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Details about the contextual identity being created.

name.description: The name of the contextual identity.

color.description: The color of the contextual identity.

icon.description: The icon of the contextual identity.

functions.name: move
functions.description: Reorder one or more contextual identities by their cookieStoreIDs to a given position.

parameters.name: cookieStoreIds
parameters.description: The ID or list of IDs of the contextual identity cookie stores.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position the contextual identity should move to.

functions.name: remove
functions.description: Deletes a contextual identity by its cookie Store ID.

parameters.name: cookieStoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the contextual identity cookie store.

events.name: onUpdated
events.description: Fired when a container is updated.

contextualIdentity.description: Contextual identity that has been updated

events.name: onCreated
events.description: Fired when a new container is created.

contextualIdentity.description: Contextual identity that has been created

events.name: onRemoved
events.description: Fired when a container is removed.

contextualIdentity.description: Contextual identity that has been removed
